'''Conscientious Windcatcher Sentinel''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Conscientious Windcatcher Sentinel is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.
